L

LabelIndicValidator<T> - Class in fs.validate
This class implements a ComponentValidator, where each registered component may be linked to a SwitchIconLabel, which is modified according to the validation status of the component.
LabelIndicValidator(ImageIcon, ImageIcon, ImageIcon) - Constructor for class fs.validate.LabelIndicValidator
This creates a validator which will set the icons of associated labels according to the content status of the component.

This is an immutable class representing a language in a PolyglotStringTable.

LevelAnnotatedMessage - Class in fs.log
This is class wraps a tupel of a string (that represents a formatted log message) and an org.apache.log4j.Level.

loadDefaultLoader() - Static method in class fs.xml.PolyglotStringLoader
This will load a new copy of the fsframework string table and generate a string loader associated to it.
loadFsfwTable(ResourceReference) - Static method in class fs.xml.PolyglotStringTable
Returns a clone of the table created by (fsframework)/language/fsfwStringTable.xml, which contains strings used by several framework classes.
loadXMLFile(File) - Static method in class fs.xml.XMLToolbox
Tries to open the specified XML file.
LogHistoryListener - Interface in fs.log
This interface defines a listener which listens for changes in a LogHistoryModel.
